DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the incidence and status of urgent medical conditions. After defining the urgent situations, the investigators will evaluate the adequacy of the standard medical kits and trainings.
DOC.brief_title: Urgent Medical and Surgical Conditions During Flights
DOC.detailed_description: In this study, the incidence and status of urgent medical conditions, the attitudes of health professionals who encounter such conditions, adequacy of Aerospace Medical Association (ASMA) suggested medical kits and training of cabin crew in data-received-company aircrafts and the demographic data of patients have been evaluated.
DOC.criteria: All passengers (no age limitations) needed urgent medical support during flights Patients whom medical urgency records are insufficient
